author: Catherine Campbell
comment: The food and ball blink next to him but he isn't shown eating it. And it's weird to feed him steak. But the bubbles appear directly over him. I can't tell if there was any effect because I can't open the "humger" (yes with an m) or happy green buttons. So, don't bother.
title: Sort of works?

author: Malachy Daniels
comment: Instead, it opens on the phone as a phone game but just stretched out. I like it but looks awful on the phone.
title: It doesn't open on watch

author: Jesse Christophel
comment: would be great if this were an android wear app as it is advertised, but it isn't.
title: Not actually an android wear app

author: Zak Monks
comment: Doesn't fit on a circular watch face but quite a good game

author: James Frary
comment: Did not work on my watch. I uninstalled it.
title: Did not work in moto 360

author: Jaap Westera
comment: App will nog start on moto 360. The companion app for the mobile phone is the same APK as the one for the watch

author: Gary Sheppard
comment: This could be great if I could see everything. Please add support for round watches
title: Looks like a good start

author: jason jones
comment: Rebooted both watch and phone and installed twice , only worked on phone not on the watch
title: Did not show on my lg g watch

author: Anna Hickam
comment: Cute idea and would rate higher if it worked on my device.
title: Did not work on moto 360

author: Casen
comment: Come on people this is a cool game! Let the developer take his/her time to make this a good app!
title: Awesome game
